abstract: Determines whether the view is compatible with the provided configuration.

declaration.code: @MainActor func supports(_ configuration: any UIContentConfiguration) -> Bool

overview:
## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the view supports this configuration being set to its [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentView-5fh3z/configuration] property and is capable of updating itself for the configuration; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

The default implementation assumes the view is compatible with configuration types that match the type of the view’s existing configuration.

# supports(_:)

**Instance Method**

Determines whether the view is compatible with the provided configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func supports(_ configuration: any UIContentConfiguration) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **configuration**: The new configuration to test for compatibility.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the view supports this configuration being set to its [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentView-5fh3z/configuration] property and is capable of updating itself for the configuration; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

The default implementation assumes the view is compatible with configuration types that match the type of the view’s existing configuration.
title: supports(_:)
